# userInfo

**Instance Property**

The dictionary containing the data associated with the receiver when it was created.

## Declaration

```swift
var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]? { get }
```

## Discussion

You can obtain this dictionary per event in each [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSResponder/mouseEntered(with:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSResponder/mouseExited(with:)] method by querying the passed-in `NSEvent` object with `[[event trackingArea] userData]`.

## Getting Object Attributes

- **options**: The options specified for the receiver.
- **owner**: The object owning the receiver, which is the recipient of mouse-tracking, mouse-movement, and cursor-update messages.
- **rect**: The rectangle defining the area encompassed by the receiver.
